description: A clever play on words with a shopping pun.
title: Mall Tales
n_1: Marty and Jen discuss their shopping experiences.
c1_1: Shopping centers can be so similar.
n_2: Jen tries to recall something unique about any mall.
n_3: Marty realizes the humor in the situation.
c1_3: Actually, when you think about it...
n_4: Marty delivers the pun with a smile.
